reviewText: This drama is well writen and acted.  The interpersonal relationship between parent and child shows the full range.  The story is about two main characters: a son who things money solve everything and female friend who shows that working as cohesive community to ensure that everyone is alright.  In the misst of these two people differnt views romance is developing.  They come to realize that they both want the same thing but chose differnt path to achive it.
